"You can contact us if you cannot find your password by other means. Because we receive hundreds of emails for password recovery every day, it will take 3-5 work days to reply your request. You can also retrieve your password online, or search your email archive for your password backup email."

Depo-Provera is progestogen-only contraceptive, depot medroxyprogesterone acetate (DMPA) long acting reversible hormonal contraceptive birth control drug that is injected every 3 months.(from wiki)

"The combined oral contraceptive pill (COCP), the Pill, is a birth control method that includes a combination of an estrogen (estradiol) and a progestogen (progestin).
When taken by mouth every day, these pills inhibit female fertility.(from wiki)"

"Period Calendar is awesome!
Check it out at: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.popularapp.periodcalendar
It's a great app for tracking your period, your ovulation, your symptoms, and other things you care about. I love it! It's incredibly accurate and professional, and it's totally free! You really must try it!"

A contraceptive patch is a transdermal patch applied to the skin that releases synthetic estrogen and progestin hormones to prevent pregnancy.(from wiki)

This is a loop reminder, it will remind you when you need insert or remove the V-Ring.
The ring is a flexible plastic (ethylene-vinyl acetate copolymer) ring that releases a low dose of a progestin and estrogen over three weeks.(from wiki)

There are many reasons cause irregular periods, and you can consult your doctor for more information."

"LH can be detected by urinary ovulation predictor kits (OPK, also LH-kit), around the time ovulation may be expected daily.
A negative to a positive conversion would suggest the impending ovulation within 24-48 hours, giving women two days for sexual intercourse or artificial insemination with pregnancy intentions.(From wiki)
For more detail information please check the following url: http://goo.gl/WzafU7"
Contact us if need more help

"The video can't play due to the network problem, please check the network."
We highly recommend you watch the video through WIFI

"You can start and end your period on the calendar.
Long press the date on calendar to start and end your period."
How to start and end period?

"You can also change or delete periods if entered by mistake.
Long press the data on calendar to change or delete periods."
How to change or delete periods?

What is fertile days?
Fertile days means the days with high possibility of getting pregnant.

How long is fertile days?
The app set 5 days before ovulation and 1 day after it as fertile days, for sperm can be alive 3-5 days in uterus, while ovum 12-24 hours after ovulation.

What is luteal phase?
Luteal phase length refers to the days from the ovulation date to the start date of the next period, which is usually 14 days.

Why we need luteal phase?
We predict the ovulaiton day according to luteal phase.

How to set luteal phase?
You can click \"Settings\" - \"Ovulation and Fertile\" - \"Luteal phase length\" to change the days.

The ovulation day also can be confirmed by taking ovulation test.

"Cycle length means the duration of two periods start date, usually 23-35 days.
The cycle length you entered is used to predict your next cycle length, so please enter your actural period length.
If you are not sure about your cycle length, please enter an approximate value.
The app will predict more accurate with your usage."
Please enter the start date of your last period, which will be used to predict your next period.

"Period length means bleeding days, which usually lasts between 4-7 days.
The period length you entered is used to predict your next period length.
The app will predict more accurate with your usage."

"Pill reminder will not come in the following 5 situations:

1. Install the app on SD card:
Due to restrictions of Android phones, pill reminder won't come if the app is installed on SD card.

Please move to the phone internal memory.

2. Taken pills before the reminder time:
Pill reminder won't alert you if you took pills before reminder time.

3. Hide the option of \"Contraceptive medicine\":
If you hide \"Contraceptive medicine\" after setting pill reminders, the reminder won't alert you.

Please click \"settings\" from the app - \"Show / hide options\", Tap the button behind \"Contraceptive medicine\" to green.

Then pill reminders will be displayed in app settings and alert you.

4. The settings of HUAWEI phone:
Under default situation of HUAWEI phones, the app reminders are restricted.

Please activate pill reminders by clicking \"Settings\" from HUAWEI phones - \"Startup manager\" - \"Allowed\" My calendar.

5. Set taking pill in future time:
If you set the first time of taking pills at a future time, the pill reminder will not alert you before that time."

Progestogen-only pills or progestin-only pills (POP) are contraceptive pills that contain only synthetic progestogens(progestins) and do not contain estrogen. They are colloquially known as mini pills.(from wiki)
